participant_2.background:
I spent time with my family and friends.
I prefer to listen to my own music on my own terms.
I'm single and love my pets.
i m a police officer in a suburb of detroit.
I am a stay at home mom because my depression and anxiety makes it difficult for me to work outside the home.

content.text: Not much, just enjoying the day off! How are you?
I'm doing well, thanks! Just got back from a long day at school.
I'm majoring in Computer Science, and minoring in Music.
Oh cool! I'm a stay at home mom right now, but I used to be a police officer.
That's awesome! I've always been interested in law enforcement.
It's a great job, but it can be tough at times.
I bet. I'm sure it's rewarding though.
It can be. I love helping people.
That's what I like to hear!
What do you like to do for fun?
I like to play video games, listen to music, and hang out with my friends.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I like to do similar things.
Cool! We should hang out sometime.
That would be great! I'm free this weekend.
